no container.description: name of the default container element in the extension popup

bookmarks.description: name of the bookmarks container element in the exention popup

history.description: name of the history container element in the exention popup

extensionDescription.message: A tabgroup'esque successor for Firefox Quantum

close.description: close ... used as title attribute for closing tabs or containers

searchBoxPlaceholder.description: place holder displayed in the search field

closeWithDetails.description: tooltip that tell user what to close (second parameter is optional)
